Title: Kinect Mouse Cursor
Description: Kinect Mouse Cursor is a demo application that uses the Kinect for Windows SDK and its skeletal tracking features to allow a user to use their hands to control the Windows mouse cursor.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Kinect Mouse Cursor is a demo application that uses the Kinect for Windows SDK and its skeletal tracking features to allow a user to use their hands to control the Windows mouse cursor.

Updated for Kinect for Windows SDK v1.0!
